00001 <?
00002 /**
00003  *      test routines
00004  *
00005  */
00006 require_once 'grid.php';
00007 
00008 $debug=TRUE;
00009 
00010 /**
00011  * test grid::connect()/disconnect()
00012  *
00013  * Grid::connect() opens a connection to a Grid UI server (a server that
00014  * allows one to submit and monitor jobs in the grid). It is much like
00015  * 'rsh' allowing one to send commands to the UI node.
00016  *
00017  + This routine tests Grid::connect() by opening a connection to a user
00018  * interface node, executing a simple command (ls -l) on it (on the
00019  * UI node itself) and disconnecting.
00020  *
00021  */
00022 function test_grid_connect()
00023 {
00024         $eg = new Grid;
00025         $eg->set_user("user");  // does nothing
00026         $eg->set_host("grid-ui-host");  // does nothing
00027         $eg->set_password("password");
00028         $eg->set_passphrase("XXXXXXpassphraseXXXXXX");
00029         $eg->set_work_dir("/tmp/grid/test");
00030         $eg->set_error_log("/tmp/grid/test/connection.err");
00031         $eg->pconnect();
00032         fwrite($eg->std_in, "ls -l\nlogout\n");
00033         fflush($eg->std_in);
00034         while (!feof($eg->std_out)) {
00035             $line = fgets($eg->std_out, 1024);
00036             if (strlen($line) == 0) break;
00037             echo $line."<br />\n";
00038         }
00039         $ret = $eg->pdisconnect();
00040         print_r($ret);
00041         echo "\n<br />\n<hr><br />\n";
00042 }
00043 
00044 /**
00045  * test Grid::initialize()
00046  *
00047  * Grid::initialize() allows us to identify ourselves to the Grid.
00048  * Identification must be made from a UI node, hence we need to connect
00049  * first to a UI node.
00050  *
00051  * In later versions, initialize() detects if we are already connected
00052  * and if not, opens the connection implicitly for us. Both scenarios
00053  * should be checked.
00054  */
00055 function test_grid_init()
00056 {
00057         $eg = new Grid;
00058         $eg->set_user("user");
00059         $eg->set_host("grid-ui-host");
00060         $eg->set_password("password");
00061         $eg->set_passphrase("XXXXXXpassphraseXXXXXX");
00062         $eg->set_work_dir("/tmp/grid/test");
00063         $eg->set_error_log("/tmp/grid/test/connection.err");
00064 // try both, with an existing connection and without
00065 //      $eg->pconnect();
00066 //      if not connected, initialize() will open an implicit connection
00067         $eg->pinitialize();
00068         $eg->pdestroy();
00069         $eg->pdisconnect();
00070 }
00071 
00072 test_grid_connect();
00073 //test_grid_init();
